ValidationRule.description: The end date of the Agreement cannot be earlier than the start date of the Agreement.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( YEAR(ContractStartDate__c)> YEAR(ContractEndDate__c), AND( DAY(ContractStartDate__c) > DAY(ContractEndDate__c) , MONTH(ContractStartDate__c)= MONTH(ContractEndDate__c), YEAR(ContractStartDate__c)= YEAR(ContractEndDate__c) ), AND( MONTH(ContractStartDate__c)> MONTH(ContractEndDate__c), YEAR(ContractStartDate__c)= YEAR(ContractEndDate__c) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The end date of the Agreement cannot be earlier than the start date of the Agreement.
